resources.string: I am currently speaking about Android Animations at @droidconUK in London
For more on View Animation see http://bit.ly/1a4dD6e #DroidConUK
Further information on interpolators can be found at http://bit.ly/119KZNX #DroidConUK
Get more info about grouping animations in to sets at http://bit.ly/172BCEh #DroidConUK
Jake Wharton\'s NineOldAndroids library can be found at http://bit.ly/12FZDiV #DroidConUK
For more explanation of ColorFilter please go to http://bit.ly/1bw1SDF #DroidConUK
The presentation source is at http://bit.ly/10c1fPT and the articles are at http://bit.ly/umxkPW #DroidConUK
